website_summaries.verdict: Absorbs impact at least as well as standard foam mats, and comes in a variety of sizes. And if they're not long enough, you can hook multiple mats together.
pros: Inflates and deflates in minutes with provided electric air pump
Can maintain air pressure for several days
Hook-and-loop fasteners at ends to give you option to connect with additional mats

customer_reviews.title: Great product... fun and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this! Great length for a tumbling pass. It’s made well and has held up!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbling mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves it. We haven’t had any problems with it. It does lose a little air over several days but so do air mattress. It’s worked out great for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watson

customer_reviews.title: Quality products, super fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a surprise for my daughter’s 10th birthday. First off shipping was super fast! Received a shipping confirmation within hours of placing order and then the box arrived only 3 days later. I researched for a long time on which mat to get, but when I found the 16ft in her favorite teal color it was perfect. And it come with a 500W electric motor which is a must. Blows up within minutes and has Velcro ends should we ever want to add on. For now the length is perfect for a round off backhandspring layouts, or running ariels, switchleaps, or backhandspring layout stepouts.
customer_reviews.author: C.T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great air mat and good service
customer_reviews.text: This air mat is made of strong high quality materials. My son is a gymnast so I bought two for him to train on. He uses it all the time and my son said the air mat absorbs impact better than foam mat. It is durable and I am sure it will last. It is easy to inflate, deflate and to store compared to foam mats. It is also waterproof we've used it in a pool. Great customer service. The seller answered all my questions along the buying process. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: GaryLamUSA

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for growing kids physical activities.. and for adults as well.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought EZ Glam's Gymnastic Air floor mat, my nephews love playing on it, its a great item for out door and for growing kids and even adult physical activities, our kids using it every day they don't want to deflate it they just like sleeping on it.. they also use in swimming pool as well. I love this mat for my own outdoor physical activities.. Delivery was fast and item was very securely warped. great customer service as well... Thumbs us for EZ Glam..
customer_reviews.author: Naz Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 3 gymnast and this air track has been perfect for working on her tumbling passes. She uses it in the grass, in the front yard. Great value for the price. We have the 20 foot version.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product. My daughter loves it AND this company has TOP NOTCH Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: Very bouncy and great for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Bought for my daughter to practice tumbling on and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate and deflate. My 12 year old daughter loves it and is able to use it outside. Customer service was great when I had a small problem with the delivery. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Track
customer_reviews.text: This air track works very well for my 13 year old daughter. She is an all star cheerleader, so the mats are used for jumps, drills, standing and running tumbling. She has two mats so she is able to connect them or use them separately. The material is strong and durable. Great air track for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: too narrow
customer_reviews.text: doesn't stay inflated long and too narrow- my kids roll off the sides
customer_reviews.author: new mom

customer_reviews.title: Recommend This,A bit sqeaky when blowing up
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is super bouncy and comforting when I fall. I recommend this product. The only thing that annoys me is , it is a bit sqeaky when you are blowing it up. It came right on time! Yes,it is very pricey,but when I got it I fell in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: lachlan atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great Company!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Gymnastic air mat for my daughter who absolutely had to have this. Finding one within our budget and finding one that comes from a good company was not hard to do with EZ GLAM. Their product is well worth the money. Great company, fast shipping, and great product. Will definitely do business again. My daughter is super happy and so I am with the customer service!! EZ GLAM has earn a customer for life and I will tell others to purchase from them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Syvi

customer_reviews.title: I really like this AIR TRACK
customer_reviews.text: I really like this AIR TRACK, Its very easy for my 8 Year old to inflate/deflate by herself, it was something she wanted for a very long time and it was perfect gift to buy for her birthday! It was shipped and got here right on time. The customer service was extremely helpful and very easy to communicate with! Thank you EZ GLAM!
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $30 much less $550 that I paid
customer_reviews.text: This product at first glance when you blow it up seems great! You think wow my child is going to love this and get so much use out of it. Just wait 15 minutes because all of the air completely deflates and it goes flat. This has happened since the day we bought it. I am past the 30 day return policy because returning it seemed like a nightmare and I'm trying to get amazon to do the right thing. Do not waste your hard earned money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wholehearted

customer_reviews.title: A PAIN to inflate
customer_reviews.text: The Foot pump works just fine but after you’ve blown it up and ready to put the cap on it just becomes a pain and a struggle to get it in without loosing a ton of air. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OSullivan Family

customer_reviews.title: Consider strapping it on the ground somehow
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK airtrack the whole thing moves while your jumping and flipping on it but tricks can still be done on it.
customer_reviews.author: Asanders

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed about how long the air stays in this
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed about how long the air stays in this. We bought it for a tumbling mat for my 9 year old gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: PM Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for cheer jumps or tumbling for a youth but ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for cheer jumps or tumbling for a youth but it’s not big enough for a teenager.. was disappointed by that!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Updated!!! Sent new pump daughter loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Updated: the seller sent a new pump!!!! After recieving the pump and using it. My daughter absolutely loves her air track. She uses it everyday. She practices her back tucks And many other high level skills with this air track!!!! Do not hesitate with this purchase especially if your son or daughter is a gymnastics fanatic like mine!!! I purchased this as a birthday gift for my daughter. Imagine her sadness when she couldn't use it because the pump arrived broken. Total disappointment for her birthday because she really was excited to get this as a gift. Will review again if I can get it blown up.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loved it. Only unboxed it today. Everything was in the box. She inflated it. So it is not difficult to inflate. So far on sturdiness we running good but is only day 1 same with durability. Spoke to Ez Glam on instagram and was very impress to how they handled all my questions. So far very impress!!
customer_reviews.author: Noeline

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but bag broke
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 20ft one. They did not have the color advertised in stock, but that was not an issue and they sent us a different color and the item arrived sooner than listed! The included air pump inflates and deflates the track in about 5 minutes. Warning. the 20 x 6 track is really heavy! Folded up, it feels like it ways about 70 lbs or so. The only issue I've had so far is that the canvas bag it came with is a tight fit and its hard to get the track put back in the bag and the zipper already broke the first time I put it back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to set up. My 11 yr old can do it alone. It’s big when you store it so be prepared. It did get a small hole unit (kid’s fault). The patch fixed it fine & we’ve had no problems. It’s kind of firm so it works well for back tucks & handsprings, which is why we got it. Very good for price.
customer_reviews.author: STC

customer_reviews.title: Very firm and as described by seller  🙌🏻
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was blown away with this mat. It’s firm and feels exactly like the one at her gym.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Child
customer_reviews.text: We have had for a little over a month. My daughter uses to practice cheer stunts. So far we are very pleased. Quality seems good. Pump works great. My daughter is 14 and a little on the smaller size and this is pretty heavy, but she makes it work.
customer_reviews.author: WebStyle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The mat will not remain inflated for more than a couple of hours. Everytime she wants to use it, the mat has to be reinflated. Additionally the mat is not the actual length described and is a good foot and a half short. I expected much better quality and more true to description for the price of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jammie Gourley

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: This was my third attempt at getting my daughter an air track. The first two i ordered from Walmart and they were junk. This one has held up beautifully and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for tumbling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10-year-old tumbler. She loves it! Really good quality for home. Easy to inflate and stays inflated. It’s a little short, so she can really only do one tumbling maneuver at a time, but it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas so hasn't gotten a ton of use yet but it is easy to inflate and seems very sturdy. The material is thick. Once inflated it's firm and provides a good tumbling base. Cons are that it's very heavy and a pain to roll back up and store. It takes up a lot of room and is not easy to move, (requires 2 people to move easily).
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter is in Heaven with this Air Track!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product! My daughter is in heaven with this AirTrack. 16’ is perfect size for her to do a couple tricks on. Solid build and quality of material is noticeable when first opened. Very sturdy and hopefully last a long time
customer_reviews.author: J. W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Track! Really Durable.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter who wanted to work on her acrobatics. It is easy to inflate and very durable. I used it as a gym floor while I worked out at home when my gym was closed. The only issue that we had was with the compressor after 6 months but the seller was fantastic and helped me out immediately! I would buy from them again in a heartbeat. We’ve used it inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: WiscMom

customer_reviews.title: Does what designed for. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but you have to be fast in disconnecting the hose to close the valve or you lose a ton of air. It is a bit cumbersome to put away every time but doable. Not long enough for running tumbling unless you have your spacing right. Daughter can work on and practice her standing tumbling. We are going to get another to connect two mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gymnastics and fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughters are having so much fun with this Track. I’m glad we got them the 20’, I was hesitant between 16 or 20, this is the perfect size for them to get their gymnastics tumbling achieved. It’s very easy to inflate and seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my gymnastics minded daughters and her friends. After multiple uses this summer I am happy to say that it has survived beautifully. It's been used at least twice a week for months by multiple 11 to 13 year old children and shows no sign of wear. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brasconian

customer_reviews.title: My 10yr old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine relief.... with a cancelled season, my cheerleader needed some joy!
customer_reviews.author: TK ELIE

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I made a video of my daughter using that since she can’t use the trampoline in New York it’s so cold outside she wanted a gymnastics mat and it’s perfect it’s very bouncy and she can do all of her stunts on this- we blew it up and put it in our living room and it’s the smallest size
customer_reviews.author: A Riz

customer_reviews.title: It may be great with an electric pump :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10ft track for my 7 year old daughter. The quality is good and she enjoys tumbling on it, but I do not enjoy having to pump it up with the foot pump 1-2 times a day! I do not feel as though it was well documented that this size did not come with the electric pump. If it was, I would have chosen another size or brand. Or, I wish it held the air longer. I’m glad she likes it and is eager to use it, but it’s a pain for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home practice!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 y/o daughter is on a competition team, and she wanted extra practice for flipping. I bought the 20' mat to allow for long term use as she gets taller. Absolutely fabulous choice! I had it out of the box and inflated in less than 5 minutes. To deflate, open the air chamber and fold the mat the way you want for storage, also less than 5 minutes. It is heavy duty, so be ready when you pick it up to lift. This was a great value compared to other gymnastic sites!
customer_reviews.author: April Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Gotta be quick
customer_reviews.text: Just received this maybe a week ago. This thing is super durable has a decent bounce to it. The bag it came with seems durable as well. My only two complaints are, 1 you have to be quick when your inflating it. You have to almost immediately put in the plug once you pull off the pump, and this thing deflates fast. #2 complaint none of the information that came with it was in English. Not like you really need instructions its that easy, just wouldve been nice to know warranty info etc. But other than those two things it is awesome. Daughter has enough room for tricks and tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Looses air quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. We thought maybe it needed to just expand a bit but from the first use (3 weeks after we purchased it because of birthday) the air trac never held air longer than an hour. By the time we realized that there may be a problem, we were out of our return window.We bought this for our 10 year old daughter and at this price point really expected it to hold air a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan C. Roussel

customer_reviews.title: Safe tumble track
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this air track! She practices her tumbling on it. We bought the 13 foot track and I’m glad we did, 10 Ft. may have been too short. It has been very easy to inflate, transport, and deflate. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: burst

customer_reviews.title: Air track
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been begging me to have on at the house since she is always in the gym at practice. She’s been doing gymnastic since she was 3 and has been competing as well since 4. This is something every gymnast should have
customer_reviews.author: Jessica LaLanne

customer_reviews.title: Slow leak after 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasted. Started leaking air after 1 week of use. Company claimed they would send replacement but never did. They said they would refund but also did not follow they with that. Amazon did accept the return and we were able to purchase with a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kotuby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids who want to practice tumbling skills.  But also fun for kids in general!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 16’ Air Track, about a month ago, for my 2 girls who are in gymnastics. They really love it. I asked them what they liked best about it and they replied “it doesn’t hurt when you fall” and “it’s really bouncy and makes it easier to do tricks”. I think the 16’ is the perfect. This company is very responsive to concerns as well. I had an issue with the pump hose. I contacted them and they quickly responded. They are sending out a new part. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged compressor cannot use
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my granddaughters. One households arrived damaged. The other was perfect and they love it . The damage was the compressor was broken, Most likely in shipping , but now it can not be pumped up. Would it be possible to send a replacement? Please let me know so I can let my daughter in law know Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jean Arnone

customer_reviews.title: Very durable And high quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, my daughter loves it. Easy and fast to inflate, Very durable but it is heavy to move around. Once inflated it’s much easier to move IF you have several People helping. We have the 27’x8”x 6”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pops too easily
customer_reviews.text: Sprung a leak after a a few weeks. There is a repair kit but I don’t know where the leak is coming from and it will take time to figure it out. So now sitting in a deflated heap in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I got the 13ft for my daughter for Christmas. Her and and friends love it. Perfect for tumbling or even if not Into gymnastic and have an active child that likes to flip Around etc it’s a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne DeMarines

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken part on pump. Couldn't even inflate it for the kids. They were so disappointed! Seems like it would've been durable if it had been able to be inflated.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great air track! This is the second ez glam air track we’ve purchased and this one is WAY better than the previous one. Much easier to inflate and much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it!! She is 12 and she gets this out, airs it up and places it by herself. She has even deflated and packed in the bag that comes with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: breanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Heavy materials, included a patch kit. My daughter needed a practice mat for outside. It works great on a flat patch of grass. Comes with a great bag to keep it all in to go.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 10ft Easy Glam tumble track for my daughter last year for Christmas and loved it. Went all out with the 20-foot track for her birthday and after a month, the plug popped out and will no longer seal. Return and exchange window is only 30 days so now I'm out $500.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. My kids love this air track. It inflated within 10 minutes and has held the air for over a week so far. My daughter is able to do tumbling and lands comfortably. We have been very happy with this product. Although it was not one of the expensive air tracks, it appears good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to put air in it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loses air constantly. I would send it back, but my little girl loves it. I just have to put air in about every 10-15 minutes. Smh. Hopefully the compressor holds up. Should’ve been better quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Dawn Chaffins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 13 year old to practice jumps and tumbling for Cheer. It needs a lot of room but works great. We have only used it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Channell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got her airtrack yesterday. She loves it and it is very easy to set up! It came with a carrying case that made putting it away simple. Inflating/deflating was quick and easy! She will get hours of great tumbling practice on her new airtrack!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Natalio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: So bouncy and durable! Amazing for competitive cheer. Was surprised how good of quality it is and for the price! Definitely recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: PacificNWmom

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is constantly doing gymnastics in the basement with this tumbling mat. I would recommend for any gymnast. Very sturdy the whole family can walk on it and even the dog. easy to inflate and deflate to store and holds the air. My daughter drags it up and down the stairs and out in the yard and it hasn't popped.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble, but 10ft too short
customer_reviews.text: Only takes lime 30 seconds to inflate and deflate. We got the 10ft for our 5'6 daughter. She can only do one running flip on that size. I would definitely recommend the longer mat. Great material very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: My own fault for not realizing the size when I ordered. Wish it was wider but still happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this for practicing her gymnastics skills. The directions were a little weird but could still figure out how to inflate and set up. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 14th Birthday. She is into dance and color guard and wants to get better at her gymnastics skills. This was super easy to inflate. It is sturdy and yet light enough that it is easy to move around when you are ready to get it out or put it away. It has handles on the sides which make it easy to pick up. She uses it every day. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Air pump weak
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the track. The complaint she has is that the air pump over heats very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Its good. If you can
customer_reviews.text: Its good. If you can, go with a bigger one as my daughter runs out of room with a lot of her techniques. Holds air well, but will need to be re-inflated every couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D Osterhout

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but it did not come with a silver duffle bag! We purposely selected this model as we thought it was a good value since it included the duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Becky McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Ait mat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 12 year old daughter, she absolutely loves it. It was a Christmas present and she has used everyday. Easy set up. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One has a slow leak like over a day so no big deal the other one stays inflated. We bought two. Well worth it. purchased two 15 footers and they can connect via Velcro tab if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: ahughes

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and quality service from the company. I had a question and the company went above and beyond to help out. Easy set up and take down that my child can do herself. I have already recommended this product to 3 other people I know.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Sent a broken pump and you can only use that pump to blow up the air track.
customer_reviews.text: The air track arrived, and after spending $700, the air pump had 2 holes in it. I asked for a replacement pump and never received one. With athletes that have been forced to train at home online, it would have taken months before we could another air track if we retuned the entire item. I contacted amazon and ez glam. Never received a new pump.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with this product not what I was expecting for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Track is Great. Air pump not so much!!
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter loves this air track. The air pump that comes with track is not big enough for the size track we ordered. It would get very hot after being on for a short period of time and hardly made any lead way with blowing up the track. We ended up using a shop vac to blow up the track and that took no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any gymnastics facility or home!
customer_reviews.text: We own a gymnastics center and have roughly 300+ kids come in for classes each week. This has been an amazing addition to our equipment. We’re able to have the gymnasts tumble in other areas of the gym instead of just the floor or tumble trak. Inflating/deflating, and storing are incredibly easy! We highly recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: clucspeel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practicing dance tricks for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for our 10yr old daughter that does dance competition. Makes practicing her tricks at home great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality exercise mat
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mat to practice tumbles and jumps and came across this mat - It is perfect and convenient to transport and stow away. I called EZ Glam for details on the dimensions and quality. I was impressed with their customer service and quick shipment. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and great customer service my daughter loves this product and is thrilled with it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vaccarelli

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cheer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this air trac. Worth the money and is durable
customer_reviews.author: Iris Randle

customer_reviews.title: Much better than regular mats
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter that is in gymnastics. She loves it. Well made, firm enough but has enough give to do flips on.
customer_reviews.author: 65stew

customer_reviews.title: Great for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: It only takes about 5 minutes to set up and take down. So far it is holding up well and my daughter enjoys doing tumbling on it. We put a tarp under it to try to avoid it getting to dirty or poked by something hard on the ground. Overall, great air track!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable. This is a must have. Great for flipping and jumping.
customer_reviews.author: LNeale

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: My girls love it, they are nine and 12 and it is exactly what they were looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for less than a year and it has multiple holes. Really disappointing given the price and the fact that my daughter really enjoyed it. It’s difficult to find small holes, so not easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: LauraM

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mat! The only complaint would be it doesn’t have a line going across the middle. My daughter (9 yo, competitive gymnast)prefers those. It helps her to mark/checkpoints /timings for landing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tina#4

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old can do a round off BHS on the 16’. 20’ would have been better if I had the space!
customer_reviews.author: S&K Kinross

customer_reviews.title: Air Track easy to use and pack away
customer_reviews.text: The Air Track is incredibly easy to use and pack up. Letting the air out is so easy our 11 year old can easily do it, it’s as simple as pushing a button. She absolutely loves it and uses it to practice her tumbling for cheer!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Salvaggio

customer_reviews.title: Loses air quickly
customer_reviews.text: The product works while using it but does Lose air daily and has to be blown up. I have checked for holes and don’t see any noticeable ones. When I add air the track does stay blown up while in use so it will work for now. I wish I didn’t have to continuously add air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Track
customer_reviews.text: So happy we ordered this air track! My daughter is a cheerleader and has been able to keep up with her tumbling at home since she can’t go to her gym.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Riley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it doesn’t hold air. Customer service is non-existent. A truly awful investment. It took persistence, but the vendor made it right and sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: My tumbler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to inflate, easy to deflate, easy to store in bag provided.
customer_reviews.author: MarvBoy

customer_reviews.title: Airtrack is excellent, but pump really falls apart fast
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this airtrack - my daughter has been jumping away on it for two months!!! But the pump is of poor quality. Within 2 uses the hose broke off of the attachment adapter so we are duct taping it for now, with reasonable success. Does anyone know of a way to get a better hose?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schivell

customer_reviews.title: Too hot of a surface in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome air track but because it’s black it gets instantly super hot in the sun. Within 1 minute it’s too hot to walk on in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's durable for two 10 year old boys and cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it, they can practice at home outside and it gives enough room for when they don't make the landong. It's easy to clean and stores easily. Set up is very simple as well, the kids can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Emma

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using mat every day since I bought it. She practices her tumbling and her coach notices her skilld advancing.
customer_reviews.author: catherine steilman

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had researched more before this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: deflates after only an few flips and unfortunately was provided a manual foot pump versus the one shown in the picture. As I converse with other moms about the product the ones that have one received an electric pump and the air has been in their since they purchased the equipment or does not deflate every minute. 😩
customer_reviews.author: Sebrina

customer_reviews.title: No air
customer_reviews.text: Bought mid July. Have as a present aug 14 now sept 14 it doesn’t keep air and is $50 cheaper. Window has closed on the item. Would like new one at current price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Launonen

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat, Durable, Easy to Inflate/Deflate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 8 year old daughter for her birthday. She loves it. She does cheer stunts and gymnastics on it. It inflates and deflates easily. It comes with a storage bag and it also comes with spare vinyl in case it needs to be patched. I also like that it has Velcro on the ends so multiple mats can be hooked up. It’s very durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ackroyd

customer_reviews.title: Loses air too fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product while it stayed inflated. After only a few times of my niece using it she’s had to inflate it. It’s kinda hard for her to start practicing then after only 2 passes have to stop and inflate it. I wish they would fix the air leaking out because it was great while it stayed inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable Product & Seller
customer_reviews.text: This company was so helpful! My daughter misplaced the adapters for the air pump. I emailed to ask if I could purchase replacements. They quickly responded and sent immediately with no charge! The airtrack is great quality, so durable. We are beyond pleased with this purchase. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Poe

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the mat, but it doesn't hold air very long. It is a good product, just inconvenient to have to add air to it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good may, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great for padding under our daughter to practice gymnastics at home. Easy to deflate and put away when we want the space for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: EZ GLAM 10ft/13ft/16ft/20ft Air Track Inflatable Gymnastics Tumbling Air Track Mat with Electric Air Pump for Cheerleading/Practice Gymnastics/Beach/Park/Home use
feature_bullets: WIDE APPLICATION: you can place the Air Floor on the artistic gymnastics floor,the gym floor, in high-performance training, fitness clubs,dance clubs, schools,gymnastic exercises,home entertainment, leisure centers, gymnasium, professional training, park or rental business. Also, it could be used on beach or water,backyard, grass land .Just make sure there is no fire around or sharp things

DURABLE MATERIAL: Our air tumbling is made of Double-Wall Material (also know as drop stitch material), and 0.9mm thickness durable commercial grade PVC tarpaulin. Better airtightness and durability since reinforcement are made for all seams.

EASY TO HANDLE: The inflatable air tumbling mats can be fold and unfold quickly, Optimum air pressure in all conditions, up to 5psi.Compared with the traditional foam-based mats, they take up much less space after deflating so the storage and transportation become pretty simple and economic. THE ELECTRIC ARE PUMP MAKE INFLATE EASIER

COMPLETE ACCESSORIES: You will receive an air pump for free when you purchase our product. Only take several minutes to inflate or deflate. No noise during training. After inflation, the Air tumbling will maintain its pressure for days. With the durable carry bag, it will be easy to move around the gym or take to anywhere.
MORE SAFETY: Compared with other exercising equipment, the air ramp increases the repetitive frequency and reduces the chance of being hurt
